name: video-compressor
title: Video Compressor
description: Reduce video file size with quality control (low/medium/high)
content:
Overview

This application compresses video files to reduce file size while maintaining quality. Built using MoviePy, it provides three quality levels to balance file size and video quality.

Features

  • Three compression quality levels (low/medium/high)
  • Optimized bitrate settings for each quality level
  • H.264 video codec with AAC audio
  • Shows compression ratio and file size reduction

Parameters

  • Input Video: Upload your video file from stash
  • Quality Level: Choose low (500k bitrate), medium (1000k bitrate), or high (2000k bitrate)
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a compressed MP4 video file with the suffix '_compressed' added to the original filename.

Use Cases

  • Reducing video file sizes for storage or sharing
  • Preparing videos for web upload
  • Batch compression of large video files
  • Optimizing videos for mobile devices
command: rm -rf prod_apps 2>/dev/null || true && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git && python $REPO_DIR/python/video_compressor.py "${videoFile}" -o "${outputDir}" -q "${quality}"
